CREATIVE DESIGNS AGENCY
---------------------------

Project Invoice

Project: Website Redesign
Client Reference: WR-2024-Q3
Our Reference: CDA-4521

Billable To:
Startup Ventures LLC

Breakdown:
  Design Phase          $3,000.00
  Development           $5,500.00
  Testing               $1,000.00
  Project Management    $500.00
                        ----------
  Subtotal:             $10,000.00
  Discount (10%):       -$1,000.00
                        ----------
  Net Amount:           $9,000.00
  Tax (8%):             $720.00
                        ==========
  TOTAL DUE:            $9,720.00

Dated: July 1, 2024
Payment Terms: Due upon receipt
